description: ff. 222 (incompl. at end - breaks off in bāb al-qismah) 248 x 182; 190 x 145 mm. 23 lin. 13th cen. Commentary on Muwaffaq al-Dīn ibn Qudāmahʼs ʻUmdat al-aḥkām, probably came as Brockelmann, GAL, I, 504 (3: no. 25: al-Muddah!); Shams al-Dīn V, 114. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ذى الفضل والنعم ... وبعد بهذا شرح کتاب العمدة
author: Maqdisī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ibrāhīm, 1160 or 61-1227
creator: Maqdisī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ibrāhīm, 1160 or 61-1227
